data.taskTitle: Fix whisper install script stalling on macOS
Fix whisper install script stalling on macOS
data.approach: Fix nproc command not found on macOS by using sysctl -n hw.ncpu as fallback. Also check for other macOS-incompatible commands in the script.

suggestedTasks.title: Create Comprehensive Whisper Installation Troubleshooting Guide
suggestedTasks.description: Develop a detailed troubleshooting document for Whisper installation across different environments. Document common error scenarios, dependency requirements, and step-by-step resolution strategies. Focus on capturing known installation pitfalls and providing clear mitigation steps for users experiencing package setup challenges.
suggestedTasks.reason: Recurring installation complexity identified during user support

suggestedTasks.title: Enhance Dependency Management for AI Packages
suggestedTasks.description: Review and improve dependency resolution mechanisms for complex AI packages like Whisper. Implement more robust package installation validation and provide clearer error messaging. Investigate potential pre-flight checks to prevent installation stalls.
suggestedTasks.reason: Identified potential systemic installation reliability issues

gotchas: Whisper package may have non-standard installation requirements
